definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve

sentences.english: Many hospitals and health centers offer classes in mindfulness meditation.
sentences.chinese: 很多医院和健康中心提供留神冥想课程。

sentences.english: I took care not to be such a perfect mimic around my dad.
sentences.chinese: 于是我留神不在爸爸身边做完美的模仿。

sentences.english: Please note that high-light color and skin colors.
sentences.chinese: 高光调色请留神跟肤色的拆配。

sentences.english: Traffic safety: it's a dangerous street, I pay more attention to.
sentences.chinese: 交通安全名言马路如虎口，劝君多留神。

sentences.english: Zeus stood up to shake off the dung pellet, and the eggs were thrown to the ground without his thinking.
sentences.chinese: 宙斯站起身来抖落粪蛋，没留神把鹰卵也抖掉了。

sentences.english: Accidentally, my Dachshund and Basset Hound gave birth to a mongrel.
sentences.chinese: 一不留神，我家的腊肠和巴吉度生出了一个混血种。

sentences.english: Look and make it according to the pattern, that was shewn thee in the mount.
sentences.chinese: 要留神按照在山上指示给你的式样去做。

sentences.english: When you ride in the street you must look about(you) lest you bump into someone.
sentences.chinese: 在街上骑车，你必须留神四顾，免得撞着别人。

sentences.english: A bit not careful a moment that was submerged by the flood of ants.
sentences.chinese: 稍不留神，片刻之间，就被潮水般的蚂蚁淹没了。

sentences.english: I often take my mind off my work by reading an enjoyable novel.
sentences.chinese: 通常我通过阅读小说使我的留神力从办事上转移过去。

sentences.english: Every audience was attentive to what he said.
sentences.chinese: 每个听众都很留神他说的话。

sentences.english: She accidentally let out that she was a spy when she was drunk .
sentences.chinese: 当她喝醉时她一不留神说出她是一个间谍。

sentences.english: A slim door got in past my guard.
sentences.chinese: 一扇小门趁我稍不留神。

sentences.english: Mind you, don't catch that cup with your elbow.
sentences.chinese: 留神你的胳臂肘别刮掉了那只茶杯。

sentences.english: Jim agreed to keep a look-out. He knew the Captain was afraid of this man.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆答应留神，他心里吗白，老海员会怕那个人。

sentences.english: Such as easy cutting paste, a bit not careful density board they smoke.
sentences.chinese: 譬如容易切割糊，稍不留神密度板就冒烟了。

definition: to be careful/to pay attention to
lit. the eyes watch six roads and the ears listen in all directions/to be observant and alert (idiom)
pinyin: yan3 guan1 liu4 lu4 er3 ting1 ba1 fang1

definition: for fear that/lest/also written 唯恐
to look in all directions (idiom)/to glance around
to have a close call/to have a narrow escape
to fear/afraid/extremely nervous/for fear that/to avoid/so as not to
for fear that/lest/also written 惟恐
glancing to left and right (idiom); to look all around
